column4: I've got a burner "pretending" to burn cds, that is, i burn the iso, it goes through the motions, but when the disc is reinserted, it acts as if it is blank. Physical inspection of the CD makes me think it is still blank. Any help?
make sure you deselect "test mode" in the program you use to burn the cd
did you insert the disc upside down? :))
Ha no-- not only that, I've tried multiple disks. This is so bizarre. I've burned successfully with it before.
